nextapp.echo.extras.app
Class ToolTipContainer

java.lang.Object
  nextapp.echo.app.Component
      nextapp.echo.extras.app.ToolTipContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, nextapp.echo.app.RenderIdSupport
public class ToolTipContainer
extends nextapp.echo.app.Component

ToolTipContainer component: a container which may contain two children, the first of which is always displayed and the second of which is displayed when the mouse is hovered over the first. May contain zero, one, or two components as children. May not contain Pane components.

See Also:
Serialized Form
